net.engio.blox.data

Class CsvBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.engio.blox.data.CsvBlock

  • public class CsvBlock
extends Object
    Representation of a block inside a csv document. A block consists of a header and a body and provides access to its underlying data as well as its metamodel (definition).
    Author:
    Benjamin Diedrichsen
